channel.title: Crash

item.title: Crash
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

This is what happend when i were playing on my server
then everyone dced and said they were already logged in

my sendframe looks like this

public void sendFrame126(String s, int id) { outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(126); outStream.writeString(s); outStream.writeWordA(id); outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord(); flushOutStream(); }
the method

[code] public void update()
{
handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);

	flushOutStream();
	sendFrame126("Click here to log out", 2458);  // Logout
	sendFrame126("Withdraw as:", 5388);  // Withdraw As:
	sendFrame126("Insert", 8132);  // Insert
	sendFrame126("Swap", 8133);  // Swap
	sendFrame126("Item", 5389);  // Item
	sendFrame126("Close Window", 5384);  // Close Window
	sendFrame126("Rearrange mode:", 5390);  // Rearrange mode:
	sendFrame126("Note", 5391);  // Note

sendFrame126(“The Bank of “+playerName+””, 5383); // The Bank of Player
}[/code]

Read full topic
